title: Georgia, Georgia, Georgia
summary:
... not since Gone with the Wind has Georgia been so much in the news.
It's Election Day in Georgia, and Dana and Chris discuss all-things runoff and 2020.
Chris gives a primer on Georgia's election system, then the discussion turns to donor money, the impact of President-elect Joe Biden on the runoff, and some 19th-century history.
Plus, Chris answers Georgia election trivia.

paragraphs: ... not since Gone with the Wind has Georgia been so much in the news.

It's Election Day in Georgia, and Dana and Chris discuss all-things runoff and 2020. Chris gives a primer on Georgia's election system, then the discussion turns to donor money, the impact of President-elect Joe Biden on the runoff, and some 19th-century history.
Plus, Chris answers Georgia election trivia.
